# IOPixelInformation | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Kernel ](/documentation/kernel)

- [ IOKit Fundamentals ](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals)

- [ IOPixelInformation ](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation)

- [ IOKit Fundamentals ](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals)

-  IOPixelInformation 

Type Alias# IOPixelInformation

macOS 10.0+

```
typedef struct IOPixelInformation IOPixelInformation;
```

## [Topics](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation#topics)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation#1599177)

[`activeHeight`](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation/1385758-activeheight)Number of visible pixel rows.[`activeWidth`](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation/1386376-activewidth)Number of pixels visible per row.[`bitsPerComponent`](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation/1386955-bitspercomponent)Number of bits per component in each pixel.[`bitsPerPixel`](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation/1385789-bitsperpixel)The number of bits per pixel, including unused bits and alpha.[`bytesPerPlane`](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation/1386773-bytesperplane)Not used.[`bytesPerRow`](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation/1386080-bytesperrow)The number of bytes per row.[`componentCount`](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation/1386141-componentcount)One for indexed pixels, three for direct pixel formats.[`componentMasks`](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation/1386799-componentmasks)Mask of the bits valid for each component of the pixel - in R, G, B order for direct pixels.[`flags`](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation/1386441-flags)None defined - set to zero.[`pixelFormat`](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation/1386721-pixelformat)String description of the pixel format - IO32BitDirectPixels, IO16BitDirectPixels etc.[`pixelType`](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation/1386181-pixeltype)One of kIOCLUTPixels (indexed pixels with changeable CLUT), kIORGBDirectPixels (direct pixels).[`reserved`](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation/1386449-reserved)Set to zero.## [See Also](/documentation/kernel/iopixelinformation#see-also)
